title: Create Unit Test Coverage
description: As a developer, I want to write comprehensive unit tests so that I can ensure code quality and catch bugs early.
soThat: I can ensure code quality and catch bugs early
acceptanceCriteria: Given new code is written, when unit tests are created, then coverage exceeds 80%
Given edge cases exist, when tests run, then all boundary conditions are validated
Given test suite executes, when completed, then all tests pass with clear assertions
